attributes.action: Real, thorough reliable testing, diagnosis and treatment of Lyme disease in NHS
attributes.additional_details:
I'm Amy, 16 and my sister Leah, 14 have both been finally diagnosed with Lyme disease after having testing and treatment for 2 years going privately. The NHS results are appallingly unreliable and many people are needlessly suffering from this cruel disease. My family and many people out there with undiagnosed 'M.E' will be thankful
Thankyou
Amy Hedayati

rejection.details:
Improve testing and treatment for lyme disease
Kirsty Cathrine
